imac.obstacle

Class Pyramid

  • java.lang.Object
    • imac.obstacle.Meteor
      • imac.obstacle.Pyramid
  • Deprecated.

    public class Pyramid
extends Meteor
    Pyramid is a child of Meteor to create obstacle with pyramid shape

    We don't use it anymore

    1.0
    Author:
    Charlie
